Held, that there was nothing in s. 429 which required the third Judge to whom the reference was made to act as though he was sitting in appeal against acquittal. The appellants a.nd Prithviraj Singh are resi- dents of village Kharela and they were on terms of enmity with the deceased Baja Ram Singh.
